attributes.action: to ensure  there  is  no   state  funding of political parties  at  election  time
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: to ensure  there  is  no   state  funding of political parties  at  election  time, as this tax  revenue should  be spent  on  schools, hospitals  &  law and  order. Also,  as  a  tax  payer  my money may  go to parties i do not agree with.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
